job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Software Engineer - Data Science Innovation and Generative AI

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes leading the ideation, design, and deployment of innovative solutions in data science and generative AI, developing functionalities for Data Science platforms, and exploring new AWS services. While it mentions 'data scientists' and 'data science', the core focus on 'generative AI', 'innovative solutions', and developing 'functionalities' for platforms, coupled with the mention of 'AWS services', aligns more closely with the GenAI Engineer profile's responsibility of building and deploying generative AI applications. The role also includes aspects of software development and MLOps, which are key components of the GenAI Engineer profile.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'innovative solutions in data science and generative AI' implies the development or adaptation of models, and 'developing creative and forward-thinking functionalities for Data Science platforms' further suggests model-based development.
job_tasks.phrase: innovative solutions in data science and generative AI

job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to creating new capabilities within data science platforms, which often involves model development or integration.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop creative and forward-thinking functionalities for Data Science platforms

job_tasks.justification: Optimizing code efficiency and investigating novel, high-speed solutions are core software engineering tasks aimed at improving performance.
job_tasks.phrase: Optimize code efficiency and investigate novel, high-speed solutions

job_tasks.justification: Driving innovation in data science technologies suggests exploring and implementing new modeling approaches.
job_tasks.phrase: Drive innovation in data science technologies

job_tasks.justification: Exploring new AWS services and optimizing product performance through experimentation and testing can involve setting up and evaluating new infrastructure or deployment strategies.
job_tasks.phrase: Explore new AWS services and optimize product performance through experimentation and testing

job_tasks.justification: Mentoring and teaching colleagues about software engineering knowledge is a collaborative and knowledge-sharing aspect of software development roles.
job_tasks.phrase: Mentor and teach colleagues, actively sharing your software engineering knowledge

job_tasks.justification: Providing expertise in building and maintaining a code library, emphasizing best practices, is a software engineering task focused on code quality and reusability.
job_tasks.phrase: Provide expertise in building and maintaining a code library, emphasizing best practices and innovation

job_tasks.justification: Automating security checks and building robust CI/CD pipelines are direct MLOps activities focused on deployment and reliability.
job_tasks.phrase: Automate security checks and build robust CI/CD pipelines

job_tasks.justification: Collaborating on the development of AWS SDK solutions involves building and integrating software components using cloud services.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate on the development of AWS SDK solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'help PostNL make great strides in data science and generative AI' and 'help them be the favorite logistics company' indicates an understanding of business goals and how AI contributes to them.
job_tasks.phrase: help PostNL make great strides in data science and generative AI

job_tasks.justification: The team's ambition to 'help PostNL make great strides by innovating in the domain of data science and AI' shows a clear connection between technical work and business objectives.
job_tasks.phrase: help PostNL make great strides by innovating in the domain of data science and AI

soft_skills.phrase: part of the PostNL engineering community in which we share "best practices" and innovations
Lead the ideation, design, and deployment of innovative solutions
Drive innovation in data science technologies
pushing the boundaries of what is possible
